data.title: Silent Witness star Emilia Fox suffered miscarriage two years ago
data.meta_description: Silent Witness star Emilia Fox has revealed how she suffered a secret miscarriage - which she blames for wrecking her marriage.
data.text:
Silent Witness star Emilia Fox has revealed how she suffered a secret miscarriage - which she blames for wrecking her marriage.

The 35-year-old actress who plays Dr Nikki Alexander in the BBC crime drama, lost her baby two years ago.

It had a devastating effect on her relationship with actor Jared Harris - son of Hollywood legend Richard Harris.

Emilia said: "We didn't explore enough the impact that had on both of us. At the time I thought, 'OK, so physically I'm better. Let's just carry on with life'.

"I thought it was like a horrible illness that you get over."

Emilia, who plays a young Elizabeth II in C4's The Queen next month, revealed she had been in therapy since her marriage broke down. She is now dating actor Jeremy Gilley.

She said: "One think I've learned is that we should have shared more."
